price: (48) And remember Ishmael, Elisha and Dhul-Kifl, and all are among the outstanding.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَ وَٱلۡيَسَعَ وَذَا ٱلۡكِفۡلِۖ وَكُلّٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡأَخۡيَارِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur is'māʿīla wal-yasaʿa wadhā al-kif'li wakullun mina al-akhyāri
